original_text: And the priest shall look, and if the eruption has spread in the skin, then the priest shall pronounce him unclean; it is a leprous disease.
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 그 병이 피부에 퍼졌으면 그를 부정하다 할지니라 이는 나병임이니라

sentences.original_text: if the eruption has spread in the skin
then the priest shall pronounce him unclean
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 그를 부정하다 선언할 것입니다
